articles.author: Ben Lovejoy
articles.title: Meta blocking news links as legislation backfires; X is sued - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Meta is blocking news links in Canada, as it did previously in Australia, following the introduction of new legislation. The...
articles.content:
Meta is blocking news links in Canada, as it did previously in Australia, following the introduction of new legislation. The development is being described as an “everyone loses” outcome … 
Tension … [+3621 chars]
